image.alt: Justia's Tim Stanley and Stacy Stern Discuss 25 Years of Making Law Free

columns.blockSubtitle: Justia's Tim Stanley and Stacy Stern Discuss 25 Years of Making Law Free
description: Tim Stanley and Stacy Stern were recently highlighted on Bob Ambrogi's LawSites blog. The post includes a podcast where they discuss how they came to start FindLaw, sell the company to West, start again with Justia, their future plans, and their thoughts on the progress we’ve made in 25 years of providing free access to law. Read more here.
During the chilly winter days, Sheba loves to snuggle in blankets with her stuffies. She's looking forward to more naps and adventure walks in the new year.
